Articles.title: A deal for African ladies
Articles.author: Feza Aline Jolie
Articles.body: In this century, we need to mobilize african ladies to be productive as much as they can. Long ago, ladies were underestimated in many cultures, but they's still show how variable they have always been. There are many development areas in which women can harness their talents and abilties to change the world.
